clinical_study.brief_title: Quality Assessment in Acute Stroke Care
clinical_study.official_title: Quality of Acute Stroke Care Evaluated With a Clinical Pathway on a 16 Bed Stroke Unit - a Prospective Trial

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of the study is to evaluate the quality of care on a 16 bed stroke unit by using a new developed clinical pathway.

primary_outcome.measure: frequency of patients monitored according to the specific german procedure standard (OPS-code 8-981) (preset target 90 - 95 %)
primary_outcome.time_frame: duration of stay on stroke unit

secondary_outcome.measure: frequency of stroke been classified according to the TOAST criteria (preset target 55 - 65 %)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: duration of stay on stroke unit

secondary_outcome.measure: frequency of initiated or improved antithrombotic secondary prevention (preset target 90 - 95 %)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: duration of stay on stroke unit

secondary_outcome.measure: frequency of initiated or improved statin therapy (preset target 40 - 50 %)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: duration of stay on stroke unit

secondary_outcome.measure: frequency of totally completed clinical diagnostics regarding the etiology of the stroke (preset target 60 -70 %)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: duration of stay on stroke unit

secondary_outcome.measure: frequency of initiated or improved antihypertension therapy and reduction of systolic and diastolic blood pressure by more than 10 mmHg (preset target 60 - 70 %)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: duration of stay on stroke unit

secondary_outcome.measure: frequency of a reduction on the NIH-SS by at least two points (preset target 50 - 60 %)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: duration of stay on stroke unit

study_pop.textblock: patients with an acute ischemic stroke admitted to the stroke unit of the university hospital in Muenster, Germany

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- admission to the stroke unit of the university hospital in Muenster, Germany
- acute ischemic stroke or transient ischemic attack
Exclusion Criteria:
- intracerebral haemorrhage
- neurological symptoms due to other pathology than acute ischemic stroke or transient ischemic attack
- intraarterial thrombolysis
- necessity of artificial ventilation
